entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
